Package de.interactive_instruments.etf.bsxm.index

Class GeometryCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.interactive_instruments.etf.bsxm.index.GeometryCache
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Externalizable, java.io.Serializable
    public final class GeometryCache
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Externalizable
    The GeometryManager builds and maintains spatial indexes and an in-memory cache for JTS geometries that can be used with the GmlGeoX module. The cache is filled during the indexing of the geometries and updated when geometries are accessed using the GmlGeoX.getOrCacheGeometry(ANode) function.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • resetCache

        public void resetCache​(int maxSize)
        Resets the geometry cache, by replacing the existing cache with a new cache of the given size. That means that all cached geometries will be lost.
        Parameters:
        maxSize - new cache size

      • buildIndexUsingBulkLoading

        public void buildIndexUsingBulkLoading​(@NotNull
                                       @NotNull java.lang.String indexName)
                                throws org.basex.query.QueryException
        Create the named spatial index by bulk loading, using the STR method. Before the index can be built, entries must be added by calling prepareSpatialIndex(String, DBNodeRef, com.github.davidmoten.rtree.geometry.Geometry).

        According to https://github.com/ambling/rtree-benchmark, creating an R*-tree using bulk loading is faster than doing so without bulk loading. Furthermore, according to https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/R-tree, an STR bulk loaded R*-tree is a "very efficient tree".

        Parameters:
        indexName - Identifies the index. The empty string identifies the default index.
        Throws:
        org.basex.query.QueryException - If the index has already been built.

      • removeIndex

      • prepareSpatialIndex

        public void prepareSpatialIndex​(@NotNull
                                @NotNull java.lang.String indexName,
                                DBNodeRef nodeEntry,
                                com.github.davidmoten.rtree.geometry.Geometry geometry)
        Prepares spatial indexing by caching an entry for the named spatial index.

        With an explicit call to buildIndexUsingBulkLoading(String), that index is built.

        Parameters:
        indexName - Identifies the index. The empty string identifies the default index.
        nodeEntry - represents the node of the element to be indexed
        geometry - the geometry to use in the index
